As an AI language model, I don't have access to the specific location of the new Metro stations or local restaurant information. However, there are a few ways you can find good restaurants near the Metro stations:

1. Online searches: You can look up the name or location of the Metro station and search for nearby restaurants on Google Maps or other review sites like Yelp or TripAdvisor.

2. Mobile apps: Some restaurant review apps like OpenTable, Zomato and Foursquare often list restaurants by location and provide user reviews, ratings, and menus.

3. Official tourism websites: Check the official tourism website of your city for recommendations on popular restaurants and must-try local eats.

4. Metro transit authority: Some Metro transit authorities may provide information on nearby restaurants or dining options in the vicinity of new Metro stations.

Once you have a list of potential restaurants, be sure to check their hours of operation, menus, and prices to see if they meet your needs. Additionally, you may want to consider the restaurant's proximity to the Metro station and whether it is easily accessible during your commute.
